name: Summer Berry Chocolate Pudding
description: Berries & chocolate, whatâ€™s not to love? Indulge in the sweet taste of summer with a perfectly portioned dessert, ready in 10 min.

ingredients.name: Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix or Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix

preparation: In a bowl, blend Chocolate Pudding Mix with milk and 2 tbsp Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix. Using an electric mixer, beat on medium for 2 minutes.
Spoon into small bowls and refrigerate until chilled, 10 minutes. Toss berries with 2 tbsp Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix. Spoon over puddings.
